players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I'm saddened by Bob's death. We should all share any observations to identify the mafioso."
Diana: "I share your sadness, Alice. We must be vigilant. I have no concrete observations yet, but we should all watch for inconsistencies in voting and discussion."
Charlie: "I investigated Diana last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We should vote for her to protect the town."
Diana: "Charlie is lying! I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. He is trying to frame me to protect his partner."
You: "I know I'm not the mafioso, so Diana must be lying. We should trust Charlie and vote for her."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
